2026-01-13.content: Multi-region and custom dual region support for Dataproc Metastore is deprecated. You can no longer create new multi-region or custom dual region services. Existing services will continue to function.

summary.title: Dataproc Metastore regional support deprecated
summary.summary: Support for multi-region and custom dual region Dataproc Metastore services is now deprecated. New services of these types cannot be created, though existing ones will remain operational.

2025-08-20.content: Backported HIVE-26882 to version 3.1.2. Hive Metastore now supports performing transactional checks of table parameters before altering a table.

summary.title: Hive Metastore Transactional Checks
summary.summary: Hive Metastore now supports transactional checks for table parameters before alterations.

2025-08-20.content: Backported HIVE-28121 to version 3.1.2. Hive Metastore now uses direct SQL for transactionally altering table parameters.

summary.title: Hive Metastore Transactional Alteration
summary.summary: Hive Metastore now uses direct SQL for transactional table parameter alterations, incorporating HIVE-28121 into version 3.1.2.
